title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 294.1 - Corporations affected
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 294.1 - Corporations affected

State Regulations

Every gas or gas and electric corporation having annual gas
operating revenues of $100,000 or over shall establish, provide and maintain
continuing property records of its property used wholly or partly in gas
operations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
294.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
